trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory editions | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory editions | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A topic that explains choices for free and paid editions of Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: A topic that explains choices for free and paid editions of Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory editions
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory editions

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory is a service that provides comprehensive identity and access management capabilities in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory is a service that provides comprehensive identity and access management capabilities in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: It combines directory services, advanced identity governance, application access management and a rich standards-based platform for developers.
trans-unit.target: It combines directory services, advanced identity governance, application access management and a rich standards-based platform for developers.

trans-unit.source: For more information, [see this video](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/teched-europe-2014-cloud-identity-microsoft-azure-active-directory-explained/).
trans-unit.target: For more information, [see this video](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/teched-europe-2014-cloud-identity-microsoft-azure-active-directory-explained/).

trans-unit.source: Built on top of a large set of free capabilities in Microsoft Azure Active Directory, Azure Active Directory Premium and Basic editions provide a set of more advanced features to empower enterprises with more demanding identity and access management needs.
trans-unit.target: Built on top of a large set of free capabilities in Microsoft Azure Active Directory, Azure Active Directory Premium and Basic editions provide a set of more advanced features to empower enterprises with more demanding identity and access management needs.

trans-unit.source: For the pricing options for these editions, see [Azure Active Directory Pricing](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/active-directory/).
trans-unit.target: For the pricing options for these editions, see [Azure Active Directory Pricing](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/active-directory/).

trans-unit.source: When you subscribe to Azure, you get your choice of the following free and paid editions of Azure Active Directory:
trans-unit.target: When you subscribe to Azure, you get your choice of the following free and paid editions of Azure Active Directory:

trans-unit.source: **Free** - The Free edition of Azure Active Directory is part of every Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: **Free** - The Free edition of Azure Active Directory is part of every Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: There is nothing to license and nothing to install.
trans-unit.target: There is nothing to license and nothing to install.

trans-unit.source: With it, you can manage user accounts, synchronize with on-premises directories, get single sign-on across Azure, Office 365, and thousands of popular SaaS applications like Salesforce, Workday, Concur, DocuSign, Google Apps, Box, ServiceNow, Dropbox, and more.
trans-unit.target: With it, you can manage user accounts, synchronize with on-premises directories, get single sign-on across Azure, Office 365, and thousands of popular SaaS applications like Salesforce, Workday, Concur, DocuSign, Google Apps, Box, ServiceNow, Dropbox, and more.

trans-unit.source: **Basic** - Azure Active Directory Basic edition provides application access and self-service identity management requirements for task workers with cloud-first needs.
trans-unit.target: **Basic** - Azure Active Directory Basic edition provides application access and self-service identity management requirements for task workers with cloud-first needs.

trans-unit.source: With the Basic edition of Azure Active Directory, you get all the capabilities that Azure Active Directory Free has to offer, plus group-based access management, self-service password reset for cloud applications, Azure Active Directory application proxy (to publish on-premises web applications using Azure Active Directory), customizable environment for launching enterprise and consumer cloud applications, and an enterprise-level SLA of 99.9 percent uptime.
trans-unit.target: With the Basic edition of Azure Active Directory, you get all the capabilities that Azure Active Directory Free has to offer, plus group-based access management, self-service password reset for cloud applications, Azure Active Directory application proxy (to publish on-premises web applications using Azure Active Directory), customizable environment for launching enterprise and consumer cloud applications, and an enterprise-level SLA of 99.9 percent uptime.

trans-unit.source: An administrator who is licensed for the Azure Active Directory Basic edition can also activate an Azure Active Directory Premium trial.
trans-unit.target: An administrator who is licensed for the Azure Active Directory Basic edition can also activate an Azure Active Directory Premium trial.

trans-unit.source: **Premium** - With the Premium edition of Azure Active Directory, you get all of the capabilities that the Azure Active Directory Free and Basic editions have to offer, plus additional feature-rich enterprise-level identity management capabilities explained below.
trans-unit.target: **Premium** - With the Premium edition of Azure Active Directory, you get all of the capabilities that the Azure Active Directory Free and Basic editions have to offer, plus additional feature-rich enterprise-level identity management capabilities explained below.

trans-unit.source: To sign up and start using Active Directory Premium today, see [Getting started with Azure Active Directory Premium](active-directory-get-started-premium.md).
trans-unit.target: To sign up and start using Active Directory Premium today, see [Getting started with Azure Active Directory Premium](active-directory-get-started-premium.md).

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory Premium and Azure Active Directory Basic are not currently supported in China.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory Premium and Azure Active Directory Basic are not currently supported in China.

trans-unit.source: Please contact us at the [Azure Active Directory Forum](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/169401-azure-active-directory) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Please contact us at the [Azure Active Directory Forum](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/169401-azure-active-directory) for more information.

trans-unit.source: Features in Azure Active Directory Basic
trans-unit.target: Features in Azure Active Directory Basic

trans-unit.source: Active Directory Basic edition is a paid offering of Azure Active Directory and includes the following features:
trans-unit.target: Active Directory Basic edition is a paid offering of Azure Active Directory and includes the following features:

trans-unit.source: **Company branding** - To make the end user experience even better, you can add your company logo and color schemes to your organization’s Sign In and Access Panel pages.
trans-unit.target: **Company branding** - To make the end user experience even better, you can add your company logo and color schemes to your organization’s Sign In and Access Panel pages.

trans-unit.source: Once you’ve added your logo, you also have the option to add localized versions of the logo for different languages and locales.
trans-unit.target: Once you’ve added your logo, you also have the option to add localized versions of the logo for different languages and locales.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Add company branding to your Sign In and Access Panel pages](active-directory-add-company-branding.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Add company branding to your Sign In and Access Panel pages](active-directory-add-company-branding.md).

trans-unit.source: **Group-based application access** - Use groups to provision users and assign user access in bulk to thousands of SaaS applications.
trans-unit.target: **Group-based application access** - Use groups to provision users and assign user access in bulk to thousands of SaaS applications.

trans-unit.source: These groups can either be created solely in the cloud or you can leverage existing groups that have been synced in from your on-premises Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: These groups can either be created solely in the cloud or you can leverage existing groups that have been synced in from your on-premises Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Assign access for a group to a SaaS application in Azure AD](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn621141.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Assign access for a group to a SaaS application in Azure AD](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn621141.aspx).

trans-unit.source: **Self-service password reset** - Azure has always allowed directory administrators to reset passwords.
trans-unit.target: **Self-service password reset** - Azure has always allowed directory administrators to reset passwords.

trans-unit.source: With Azure Active Directory Basic, you can now reduce helpdesk calls when your users forget a password by giving all users in your directory the capability to reset their password, using the same sign in experience they have for Office 365.
trans-unit.target: With Azure Active Directory Basic, you can now reduce helpdesk calls when your users forget a password by giving all users in your directory the capability to reset their password, using the same sign in experience they have for Office 365.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Password Management in Azure AD](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn510386.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Password Management in Azure AD](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn510386.aspx).

trans-unit.source: **Enterprise SLA of 99.9%** - We guarantee at least 99.9% availability of the Azure Active Directory Basic service.
trans-unit.target: **Enterprise SLA of 99.9%** - We guarantee at least 99.9% availability of the Azure Active Directory Basic service.

trans-unit.source: [**Azure Active Directory Application Proxy**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn768214.aspx) - Give your employees secure access to on-premises applications like SharePoint and Exchange/OWA from the cloud using Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: [**Azure Active Directory Application Proxy**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn768214.aspx) - Give your employees secure access to on-premises applications like SharePoint and Exchange/OWA from the cloud using Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Features in Azure Active Directory Premium
trans-unit.target: Features in Azure Active Directory Premium

trans-unit.source: Active Directory Premium edition is a paid offering of Azure Active Directory and includes all of the features of the Free and Basic editions plus the following features:
trans-unit.target: Active Directory Premium edition is a paid offering of Azure Active Directory and includes all of the features of the Free and Basic editions plus the following features:

trans-unit.source: **Self-service group management** - Azure Active Directory Premium simplifies day-to-day administration of groups by enabling users to create groups, request access to other groups, delegate group ownership so others can approve requests and maintain their group’s memberships.
trans-unit.target: **Self-service group management** - Azure Active Directory Premium simplifies day-to-day administration of groups by enabling users to create groups, request access to other groups, delegate group ownership so others can approve requests and maintain their group’s memberships.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Self-service group management for users in Azure AD](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn641267.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Self-service group management for users in Azure AD](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn641267.aspx).

trans-unit.source: **Advanced security reports and alerts** – Monitor and protect access to your cloud applications by viewing detailed logs showing more advanced anomalies and inconsistent access pattern reports.
trans-unit.target: **Advanced security reports and alerts** – Monitor and protect access to your cloud applications by viewing detailed logs showing more advanced anomalies and inconsistent access pattern reports.

trans-unit.source: Advanced reports are machine learning-based and can help you gain new insights to improve access security and respond to potential threats.
trans-unit.target: Advanced reports are machine learning-based and can help you gain new insights to improve access security and respond to potential threats.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [View your access and usage reports](active-directory-view-access-usage-reports.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [View your access and usage reports](active-directory-view-access-usage-reports.md).

trans-unit.source: **Multi-Factor Authentication** - Multi-Factor Authentication is now included with Premium and can help you to secure access to on-premises applications (VPN, RADIUS, etc.), Azure, Microsoft Online Services like Office 365 and Dynamics CRM Online, and thousands of Non-MS Cloud services preintegrated with Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: **Multi-Factor Authentication** - Multi-Factor Authentication is now included with Premium and can help you to secure access to on-premises applications (VPN, RADIUS, etc.), Azure, Microsoft Online Services like Office 365 and Dynamics CRM Online, and thousands of Non-MS Cloud services preintegrated with Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Simply enable Multi-Factor Authentication for Azure Active Directory identities, and users will be prompted to set up additional verification the next time they sign in.
trans-unit.target: Simply enable Multi-Factor Authentication for Azure Active Directory identities, and users will be prompted to set up additional verification the next time they sign in.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Adding Multi-Factor Authentication to Azure Active Directory](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn249466.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Adding Multi-Factor Authentication to Azure Active Directory](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn249466.aspx).

trans-unit.source: **Microsoft Identity Manager (MIM)** - Premium comes with the option to grant rights to use a MIM server (and CALs) in your on-premises network to support any combination of Hybrid Identity solutions.
trans-unit.target: **Microsoft Identity Manager (MIM)** - Premium comes with the option to grant rights to use a MIM server (and CALs) in your on-premises network to support any combination of Hybrid Identity solutions.

trans-unit.source: This is a great option if you have a variation of on-premises directories and databases that you want to sync directly to Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: This is a great option if you have a variation of on-premises directories and databases that you want to sync directly to Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: There is no limit on the number of FIM servers you can use, however, MIM CALs are granted based on the allocation of an Azure Active Directory premium user license.
trans-unit.target: There is no limit on the number of FIM servers you can use, however, MIM CALs are granted based on the allocation of an Azure Active Directory premium user license.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Deploy MIM 2010 R2](https://www.microsoft.com/server-cloud/products/forefront-identity-manager/features.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Deploy MIM 2010 R2](https://www.microsoft.com/server-cloud/products/forefront-identity-manager/features.aspx).

trans-unit.source: **Enterprise SLA of 99.9%** - We guarantee at least 99.9% availability of the Azure Active Directory Premium service.
trans-unit.target: **Enterprise SLA of 99.9%** - We guarantee at least 99.9% availability of the Azure Active Directory Premium service.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Active Directory Premium SLA](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/sla/).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Active Directory Premium SLA](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/sla/).

trans-unit.source: **Password reset with write-back** - Self-service password reset can be written back to on-premises directories.
trans-unit.target: **Password reset with write-back** - Self-service password reset can be written back to on-premises directories.

trans-unit.source: [Azure Active Directory Connect Health](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn906722.aspx): monitor the health of your on premises Active Directory infrastructure and get usage analytics.
trans-unit.target: [Azure Active Directory Connect Health](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn906722.aspx): monitor the health of your on premises Active Directory infrastructure and get usage analytics.

trans-unit.source: Comparing editions: Capabilities common to all editions
trans-unit.target: Comparing editions: Capabilities common to all editions

trans-unit.source: Directory as a service
trans-unit.target: Directory as a service

trans-unit.source: For the free edition, there is a 500K object limit.
trans-unit.target: For the free edition, there is a 500K object limit.

trans-unit.source: But the 500k object limit does not apply for Office 365, Microsoft Intune or any other Microsoft online service that relies on Azure Active Directory for directory services.
trans-unit.target: But the 500k object limit does not apply for Office 365, Microsoft Intune or any other Microsoft online service that relies on Azure Active Directory for directory services.

trans-unit.source: The Basic and Premium editions have no object limit.
trans-unit.target: The Basic and Premium editions have no object limit.

trans-unit.source: User and group management using UI or Windows PowerShell cmdlets
trans-unit.target: User and group management using UI or Windows PowerShell cmdlets

trans-unit.source: Device registration
trans-unit.target: Device registration

trans-unit.source: Access Panel portal for single sign-in (SSO) based user access to SaaS and custom applications
trans-unit.target: Access Panel portal for single sign-in (SSO) based user access to SaaS and custom applications

trans-unit.source: With Azure Active Directory Free and Azure Active Directory Basic, end users who have been assigned access to each SaaS app, can see up to 10 apps in their Access Panel and get single sign-in access to them (assuming they have first been configured with SSO by the admin).
trans-unit.target: With Azure Active Directory Free and Azure Active Directory Basic, end users who have been assigned access to each SaaS app, can see up to 10 apps in their Access Panel and get single sign-in access to them (assuming they have first been configured with SSO by the admin).

trans-unit.source: Admins can configure SSO and assign user access to as many SaaS apps as they want with Free, but end users will see only 10 apps in their Access Panel at a time.
trans-unit.target: Admins can configure SSO and assign user access to as many SaaS apps as they want with Free, but end users will see only 10 apps in their Access Panel at a time.

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory Premium has no application limit.
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory Premium has no application limit.

trans-unit.source: User-based application access management and provisioning
trans-unit.target: User-based application access management and provisioning

trans-unit.source: Self-service password change for cloud users
trans-unit.target: Self-service password change for cloud users

trans-unit.source: Directory synchronization tool: For syncing between on-premises Active Directory and Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Directory synchronization tool: For syncing between on-premises Active Directory and Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.source: Standard security reports
trans-unit.target: Standard security reports

trans-unit.source: Comparing editions: Premium and Basic capabilities
trans-unit.target: Comparing editions: Premium and Basic capabilities

trans-unit.source: High availability SLA uptime (99.9%)
trans-unit.target: High availability SLA uptime (99.9%)

trans-unit.source: Group-based application access management and provisioning
trans-unit.target: Group-based application access management and provisioning

trans-unit.source: Customization of company logo and colors to the Sign In and Access Panel pages
trans-unit.target: Customization of company logo and colors to the Sign In and Access Panel pages

trans-unit.source: Self-service password reset for cloud users
trans-unit.target: Self-service password reset for cloud users

trans-unit.source: Application Proxy: Secure Remote Access and single sign-in to on-premises web applications
trans-unit.target: Application Proxy: Secure Remote Access and single sign-in to on-premises web applications

trans-unit.source: Comparing editions: Premium-only features
trans-unit.target: Comparing editions: Premium-only features

trans-unit.target: Self-service group management for cloud users

trans-unit.source: Self-service password reset with on-premises write-back
trans-unit.target: Self-service password reset with on-premises write-back

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Identity Manager (MIM) server licenses – For syncing between on-premises databases and/or directories and Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Identity Manager (MIM) server licenses – For syncing between on-premises databases and/or directories and Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.source: Advanced anomaly security reports (machine learning-based)
trans-unit.target: Advanced anomaly security reports (machine learning-based)

trans-unit.source: Cloud app discovery
trans-unit.target: Cloud app discovery

trans-unit.source: Advanced application usage reporting
trans-unit.target: Advanced application usage reporting

trans-unit.source: Multi-Factor Authentication service for cloud users
trans-unit.target: Multi-Factor Authentication service for cloud users

trans-unit.source: Multi-Factor Authentication server for on-premises users
trans-unit.target: Multi-Factor Authentication server for on-premises users

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory Connect Health
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory Connect Health

trans-unit.source: Features currently in public preview
trans-unit.target: Features currently in public preview

trans-unit.source: The following features are currently in public preview and will be added soon:
trans-unit.target: The following features are currently in public preview and will be added soon:

trans-unit.source: [Administrative units](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn832057.aspx): a new Azure Active Directory container of resources that can be used for delegating administrative permissions over subsets of users and applying policies to a subset of users.
trans-unit.target: [Administrative units](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn832057.aspx): a new Azure Active Directory container of resources that can be used for delegating administrative permissions over subsets of users and applying policies to a subset of users.

trans-unit.source: [Add your own SaaS applications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn893637.aspx) to Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: [Add your own SaaS applications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn893637.aspx) to Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Password rollover for Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
trans-unit.target: Password rollover for Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

trans-unit.source: For more information, read [this article](http://blogs.technet.com/b/ad/archive/2015/02/20/azure-ad-automated-password-roll-over-for-facebook-twitter-and-linkedin-now-in-preview.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information, read [this article](http://blogs.technet.com/b/ad/archive/2015/02/20/azure-ad-automated-password-roll-over-for-facebook-twitter-and-linkedin-now-in-preview.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Dynamic group membership.
trans-unit.target: Dynamic group membership.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [this article](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn913807.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [this article](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn913807.aspx).

trans-unit.source: [Conditional Access](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn906877.aspx): Multifactor Authentication per application.
trans-unit.target: [Conditional Access](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn906877.aspx): Multifactor Authentication per application.

trans-unit.source: HR application integration: Workday
trans-unit.target: HR application integration: Workday

trans-unit.source: Privileged Identity Management: Privileged identity management provides improved oversight to help meet service level agreements and regulatory compliance requirements.
trans-unit.target: Privileged Identity Management: Privileged identity management provides improved oversight to help meet service level agreements and regulatory compliance requirements.

trans-unit.source: Self-service application requests: Administrators can provide a list of SaaS apps to users from which so that users can choose the ones they want to use, and the apps either will be available immediately or after approval.
trans-unit.target: Self-service application requests: Administrators can provide a list of SaaS apps to users from which so that users can choose the ones they want to use, and the apps either will be available immediately or after approval.

trans-unit.source: Azure reporting API: data for every security report of Azure Active Directory will be available to other monitoring or SIEM tools.
trans-unit.target: Azure reporting API: data for every security report of Azure Active Directory will be available to other monitoring or SIEM tools.
